name: Check Win
tag_list: check-win, app, iphone, android, prizes-promote, business, directory
overview:
Check Win is website that gives users a chance to win prizes and gift cards to their favorite places. Users leave comments on why they like places and the comments that receives the most votes wins a prize.

Check Win is a Social Business Directory. The website lists all that users are eligible to win prizes or gift cards. Currently, Check Win is giving away gift cards at places like McDonalds, Subway, Best Buy, Walmart and more.
